text: Barbara Barone (born 21 August 1943) is a Chilean equestrian. She competed in the team jumping event at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Chile Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in equestrian Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Chile Category:Equestrians at the 1971 Pan American Games Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Barbara Barone
